§inputLegendBefore
sumArrayElements([null, NaN, false]) =




§quizQuestion
What will be displayed in the console?



§quizJS
function sumElements (array = [null, NaN, false]) {
  if (!Array.isArray(array)) return 0

  var sum = 0
  for (var j = 0; j < array.length; j++) {
    sum += array[j]
  }

  return sum
}

console.log(sumElements())



§rightInput
NaN
